1.TITLE:
Basic Regular 
Fit Jeans
1.DESC: Basic Regular Fit Jeans are made from cotton and Elastane. Light effects of color give a modern twist to the jeans. In a body-hugging cut with a straight leg.

2.TITLE:
Printed & 
Big T-shirt
2.DESC: Short-sleeved shirt in an exceptional finish, made from pure cotton,with a comfortableround neckline. This great shirt should find a place in every wardrobe.
2.SHORTDESC:
- Short sleeves 
- Round neckline 
- Soft feel 
- Statement print

5.TITLE:
Text print 
T-shirt
5.DESC: The print T-shirt combines 100% cotton with a comfortable regular fit to create a comfortable Best Basic for every day. The momentum of the design adds to the striking statement print in white and red colors.
5.SHORTDESC:
- Short sleeves 
- Round neckline 
- Soft feel 
- Statement print

6.TITLE: Hooded Open Sweater
6.DESC: The lightweight open sweater with hood and modern shaped fit ensure incomparable comfort. The structured design is gently interrupted by the pocket and insets at the zip.
